# arguments

**Instance Property**

An array of instances that describe the arguments of a compute function.

## Declaration

```swift
var arguments: [MTLArgument] { get }
```

## Discussion

Each element in the array is an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArgument] instance that describes one of the function’s arguments. The elements in the array are in the same order that the arguments appear in the function declaration.

## Related Documentation

- **Metal Shading Language Guide**
- **Metal Programming Guide**
